name: goodbye
responses: It was a pleasure to assist you. Do have a great day.

name: document_memory
responses: Feel free to share all about your memory {{user_name}}.
I'll do my best to capture your special moments {{user_name}}.
Please tell me all about the memory you would like to document {{user_name}}.

name: additional_memory
responses: Would you like to add anything else to your memory?
Is there anything else on your mind that you'd like to add?

name: confirm_save_memory
responses: I'll remember this moment for you.
Thanks for sharing, I've captured all of it.
